articles.title: US Economy Adds 245000 Jobs in November as Hiring Slows - Investopedia
articles.description: The U.S. Economy added 245,000 Jobs in November as Hiring Slows amid a resurgence in the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
• U.S. economy added 245,000 jobs in November far fewer than expected
  • The unemployment rate fell to 6.7% from 6.9%
  • Long-term unemployed grew to 3.9 million people
